Package fun.connor.lighter.adapter

Core interfaces and classes for the Lighter's generic serialization API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FilteringTypeAdaptorFactory
    Extension of the TypeAdapterFactory interface which allows the factory declare a filter for the Java types and IANA Media Types it supports.
    TypeAdapter<T>
    Basic interface for classes that provide serialization and deserialization.
    TypeAdapterFactory
    Factory for constructing new TypeAdapter instances.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicAdaptorFilter
    A decorator which transforms a TypeAdapterFactory into a FilteringTypeAdaptorFactory with the given predicate.
    DelegatingAdaptorFactory
    Creates adapters based on a delegation chain.
    DelegatingAdaptorFactory.Builder
    Fluent builder for constructing DelegatingAdaptorFactory instances
    TypeAdaptorFilter
    Decorator for adding filtering conditions to FilteringTypeAdaptorFactory.
    TypeRequirement
    Description of a serialization and deserialization requirement.

Package fun.connor.lighter.adapter Description

Core interfaces and classes for the Lighter's generic serialization API. These interfaces and classes provide the application with an implementation agnostic solution to serialization and deserialization of Java objects.
